Mendagri: Sederhanakan Birokrasi, ASN dan Kepala Daerah Perlu Ubah 'Mindset'
06 Nov 2019, 23:06 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Mendagri: Sederhanakan Birokrasi, ASN dan Kepala Daerah Perlu Ubah 'Mindset'

KBRN, Jakarta : Dalam Rapat Kerja (Raker) dengan Komisi II DPR RI, Menteri Dalam Negeri (Mendagri) Tito Karnavian mengatakan tidak punya visi-misi Kementerian Dalam Negeri (Kemendagri), karena semua hanya melaksanakan visi-misi Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) dan Wakil Presiden Ma'ruf Amin.Â "Kemendagri tidak memiliki visi dan misi karena yang kami lakukan adalah menjabarkan visi dan misi Presiden dan Wakil Presiden," kata Mendagri Tito Karnavian di Gedung DPR RI, Kompleks Parlemen Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Ada lima poin yang dipaparkan Tito dalam Raker tadi siang yang meliputi pembangunan sumber daya manusia (SDM), pembangunan infrastruktur, penyederhanaan regulasi, penyederhanaan birokrasi, serta transformasi ekonomi. Dan yang menjadi prioritasnya adalah penyederhanaan regulasi guna mempermudah masuknya investasi."Narasi Pak Presiden selalu permudah regulasi, buka investasi, karena dari anggaran APBN saja tidak cukup. Undang investasi dalam ataupun luar negeri. Tapi harus permudah regulasinya, karena pengusaha banyak yang komplain, regulasinya bertumpuk-tumpuk banyak sekali,"sambung Tito.Untuk mencapai hal tersebut perlu pengubahan pola pikir para ASN juga. Karena jika gaya mereka tidak diubah, hingga regulasi tetap dipersulit, banyak pihak yang akan dipersulit. Demikian turut dipaparkan Tito kepada anggota dewan dari Komisi II DPR RI."Oleh karena itu, kami akan breakdown semua perbaikan yang bisa disumbangsih oleh Kemendagri sebagai institusi. Pengawasan di daerah, kami juga punya kewenangan apa yang bisa dipotong akan dipotong. Disederhanakan, mengubah mindset teman-teman di daerah. Bukan hanya kepala daerah, termasuk para aparatur sipil negara lainnya supaya disederhanakan. Perlu diingat lagi, mempersulit (regulasi) akan merugikan semuanya," kata Tito. (Jorike Fitri/RRI-PRO3)

Minister of Home Affairs: Simplify Bureaucracy, ASN and Regional Heads Need to Change 'Mindset'
Nov 6, 2019, 23:06 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Minister of Home Affairs: Simplify Bureaucracy, ASN and Regional Heads Need to Change 'Mindset'

KBRN, Jakarta: In a Working Meeting (Raker) with the House of Representatives Commission II, the Minister of the Interior (Mendagri) Tito Karnavian said that he did not have the vision and mission of the Ministry of Home Affairs (Kemendagri), because all of them only carried out President Joko Widodo's (Jokowi's) vision and mission and Vice President Ma'ruf Amin. "The Ministry of Home Affairs does not have a vision and mission because what we do is outlining the vision and mission of the President and Vice President," said Home Minister Tito Karnavian at the Republic of Indonesia Parliament Building, Senayan Parliament Complex, Jakarta, Wednesday (6/11/2019). There are five points that Tito explained in the Raker this afternoon which included the development of human resources (HR), infrastructure development, simplification of regulations, simplification of bureaucracy, and economic transformation. And the priority is the simplification of regulations in order to facilitate investment entry. "The President's narrative always facilitates regulation, open investment, because from the APBN budget it is not enough. Acts for domestic or foreign investment. But it must simplify regulation, because many entrepreneurs are complaining, regulations. a lot of piles, "continued Tito. To achieve this, it was necessary to change the mindset of the ASNs as well. Because if their style is not changed, so that regulations remain complicated, many parties will be complicated. Thus said Tito to the board members of the House of Representatives Commission II. "Therefore, we will breakdown all improvements that can be contributed by the Ministry of Home Affairs as an institution. Oversight in the regions, we also have the authority what can be cut will be cut. Simplified, changing mindset friends in the region. Not only the regional head, including the civil servants of other countries so that it is simplified. Keep in mind, complicating (regulation) will harm everything, "said Tito. (Jorike Fitri / RRI-PRO3)
